description: Main source file for Flutter-based online bookstore frontend app, defining app structure, theme, models, state management, UI components, and navigation.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Defines the color palette and gradients used in the application.

classes.name: Book
classes.description: Represents a book with details such as title, author, category, price, rating, cover URL, description, and featured flag.

classes.name: CartItem
classes.description: Represents an item in the shopping cart, including the book and quantity.

classes.name: MockBookRepository
classes.description: Simulates API data source, providing methods to fetch categories, featured books, search results, and book details.

classes.name: CatalogState
classes.description: Manages search, filter, and sort state for catalog browsing.

classes.name: CartState
classes.description: Manages shopping cart contents, adding/removing items, and total calculations.

classes.name: UserState
classes.description: Mock user profile state with name and email, supporting updates.

classes.name: BookStoreApp
classes.description: Main app widget initializing providers and theme, setting up the root navigation.

classes.name: RootNav
classes.description: Main bottom navigation container with pages for Home, Shop, Cart, Profile.

classes.name: GradientHeader
classes.description: Custom app bar with linear gradient background.

classes.name: HomePage
classes.description: Displays featured books and a hero section with call to action.

classes.name: CatalogPage
classes.description: Search, filter, sort, and display list of books as grid.

classes.name: BookCard
classes.description: Displays book cover, title, author, rating, and price; navigates to details.

classes.name: BookDetailPage
classes.description: Shows detailed info about a selected book, with add-to-cart button.

classes.name: CartPage
classes.description: Lists cart items with quantity controls and total amount, with checkout button.

classes.name: CheckoutPage
classes.description: Mock checkout form with shipping info, payment method, and order summary.

classes.name: ProfilePage
classes.description: User profile overview with options to view and edit info, navigate to settings.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the app, runs the BookStoreApp widget.

methods.name: imageProviderFor
methods.description: Provides an ImageProvider; MemoryImage with transparent placeholder during tests, NetworkImage otherwise.

methods.name: buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs Flutter ThemeData with custom color scheme and component styles.
